plant.name: Calathea Orbifolia
plant.img: image/SCL/Cây đuôi cong tảo xanh thủy sinh.png
plant.intro: Calathea orbifolia with its lush green foliage, is one of the many types of Calathea that make beautiful statement houseplants
plant.p1: Watch for scale, aphids, mealybugs, thrips and spider mites
plant.p4: Calathea Orbifolia thrives in bright, indirect light. Place near a window but avoid direct sunlight. Artificial lights can be used as a supplement if necessary.

plant.name: Calathea Roseopicta Dottie
plant.img: image/SCL/Cây đuôi cong tím thủy sinh.png
plant.intro: The Calathea roseopicta dottie is a beautiful house plant with long striped leaves for which it is best known for
plant.p1: Watch for scale, aphids, mealybugs, thrips and spider mites.
plant.p4: Calathea roseopicta Dottie prefers bright, indirect light. Place near windows but avoid direct sunlight. Artificial lights can be used as a supplement if necessary.

plant.name: Aglaonema Commutatum
plant.intro: Aglaonema commutatum, commonly called Chinese evergreen, is an evergreen perennial that generally resembles dieffenbachia (dumb cane) in appearance.
plant.p1: Watch for aphids, mealybugs, spider mites or scale. Rots may occur if plants are over-watered. Leaves may brown up if plants are grown in very dry air or placed in a drafty location.
plant.p4: Aglaonema commutatum (Chinese Evergreen) can tolerate low to moderate indirect light but prefers bright, indirect light. Avoid direct sunlight. Artificial lighting can be used as a supplement.

plant.name: Anthurium Andraeanum
plant.intro: Anthurium andraeanum, commonly called flamingo lily or painter’s palette, is native to Colombia and Ecuador.
plant.p1: Watch for mealybugs, spider mites, white fly or scale. Foliage may scorch in dry or drafty locations. Rots, blight and leaf spot may occur.
plant.p4: Anthurium andraeanum (Flamingo Lily) requires bright, indirect light. Place near north or east-facing windows, avoiding direct sunlight. Artificial lighting can be used.

plant.name: Sansevieria Trifasciata Futura Superba
plant.intro: Sansevieria 'Futura Superba' is a striking Snake Plant featuring wide, sword-shaped, succulent foliage with green, striped centers and yellow edges.
plant.p1: Watch for mealybugs, spider mites, white fly or scale. Foliage may scorch in dry or drafty locations. Rots, blight and leaf spot may occur.
plant.p4: Sansevieria trifasciata Futura Superba (Snake Plant) can thrive in low to moderate light conditions. It tolerates both direct and indirect light. Artificial lighting can be used as a supplement.

plant.name: Aglaonema Snow White
plant.intro: Aglaonema Snow White, commonly called Chinese evergreen, is an evergreen perennial that generally resembles dieffenbachia (dumb cane) in appearance.
plant.p1: Watch for aphids, mealybugs, spider mites or scale. Rots may occur if plants are over-watered. Leaves may brown up if plants are grown in very dry air or placed in a drafty location.
plant.p4: Aglaonema Snow White prefers medium to low light conditions, tolerates low light, and benefits from bright, indirect light. Avoid direct sunlight and use artificial lighting if necessary.

plant.name: Dracaena Sanderiana
plant.intro: Dracaena sanderiana, commonly called lucky bamboo, is a small to medium sized, slow-growing, herbaceous perennial native to tropical western Africa.
plant.p1: Watch for aphids, mealybugs, spider mites or scale. Rots may occur if plants are over-watered. Leaves may brown up if plants are grown in very dry air or placed in a drafty location.
plant.p4: Dracaena sanderiana (Lucky Bamboo) can tolerate low light but prefers bright, indirect light. Avoid direct sunlight and use artificial lighting if necessary.

plant.name: Dracaena Dorado
plant.intro: Dracaena dorado can grow up to 4 or 5 feet tall indoors, and will only spread to about 1.5 feet (though this spread may be larger if you have more than one plant in a pot).
plant.p1: Soft rot and bacterial leaf spot are possible diseases. Watch for mealybugs, aphids, scale and spider mites.
plant.p4: Dracaena dorado (Golden Pothos) can tolerate low light but prefers bright, indirect light. Avoid direct sunlight and use artificial lighting if necessary.

plant.name: Syngonium Podophyllum
plant.img: image/SCL/Cây trọc bạc hồng thủy sinh.png
plant.intro: Syngonium podophyllum, commonly called arrowhead vine, is native from Mexico to Ecuador. It is an evergreen climbing vine that typically grows to 3-6’ long.
plant.p1: Soft rot and bacterial leaf spot are possible diseases. Watch for mealybugs, aphids, scale and spider mites.
plant.p4: Syngonium podophyllum (Arrowhead Plant) prefers bright, indirect light. It can tolerate lower light conditions, but avoid direct sunlight. Artificial lighting can be used as a supplement if necessary.

plant.name: Peperomia Obtusifolia
plant.intro: Peperomia obtusifolia is a bushy upright plant that is native to southern Florida and the Caribbean. As a houseplant, it typically grows on thick erect stems to 12” tall.
plant.p1: Watch for mealybugs, spider mites and white fly. Leaf spots may occur. Susceptible to rot if soils are kept too moist.
plant.p4: Peperomia obtusifolia (Baby Rubber Plant) prefers bright, indirect light. It can tolerate lower light conditions and artificial lighting. Avoid direct sunlight.

plant.name: Bougainvillea Spectabilis
plant.intro: Bougainvillea spectabilis grows as a woody vine or shrub, reaching 15 to 40 feet (4.6 to 12.2 m) with heart-shaped leaves and thorny, pubescent stems.
plant.p1: Mealybug and scale can be a problem indoors and aphids can be troublesome outdoors. Keep plants out of high traffic areas to avoid injury from the thorns

plant.name: Bougainvillea Spectabilis
plant.img: image/Outdoor Plant/Cây bông giấy Thái màu trắng.png
plant.intro: Bougainvillea spectabilis grows as a woody vine or shrub, reaching 15 to 40 feet (4.6 to 12.2 m) with heart-shaped leaves and thorny, pubescent stems.

plant.name: Lady of Shalott
plant.intro: 'Lady of Shalott' is a medium, bushy shrub rose, 3 to 4 ft (0.91–1.22 m) in height, with a 2 to 3 ft (0.61–0.91 m) spread.
plant.p1: Mealybug and scale can be a problem indoors and aphids can be troublesome outdoors. Keep plants out of high traffic areas to avoid injury from the thorns

plant.name: Petraeovitex bambusetorum
plant.img: image/Outdoor Plant/Cây hoa lan hoàng dương.png
plant.intro: The Nong Nooch Vine is an amazing climber that brings ease of culture, vigorous growth and stunning floral form to the container gardener.
plant.p1: Mealybug and scale can be a problem indoors and aphids can be troublesome outdoors. Keep plants out of high traffic areas to avoid injury from the thorns

plant.name: Camellia Japonica
plant.intro: Camellia japonica, commonly called Japanese camellia, is an evergreen shrub
plant.p1: Camellias are susceptible to a number of fungal diseases including leaf spots, black mold, flower blight, canker and root rot.

plant.name: Camellia Amplexicaulis
plant.intro: Camellia amplexicaulis belongs to a genus of flowering plants in the family Theaceae.
plant.p1: Keep plants out of high traffic areas to avoid injury from the thorns

plant.name: Red Eden
plant.intro: Her blossoms are produced in good numbers on a very vigorous plant with semi-glossy, dark green foliage.
plant.p1: Keep plants out of high traffic areas to avoid injury from the thorns

plant.name: Soeur Emmanuelle rose
plant.intro: The Soeur Emmanuelle Rose, bred by G. Delbard in France in 2004, is a climbing rose variety with captivating pink-purple flowers. Its blossoms are particularly fragrant and double-flowered. Soeur Emmanuelle is also known for its robustness and good disease resistance as a climbing rose.
plant.p1: The Soeur Emmanuelle Rose, bred by G. Delbard in France in 2004, is a climbing rose variety with captivating pink-purple flowers. Its blossoms are particularly fragrant and double-flowered. Soeur Emmanuelle is also known for its robustness and good disease resistance as a climbing rose.

plant.name: Rosmarinus officinalis
plant.intro: Not only does the rosemary plant serve as decoration for a balcony or garden, but it is also an herb that enhances the flavor of dishes. Rosemary has various health benefits for humans as well, such as cooling effects, diuretic properties, anti-inflammatory properties, digestive support, and its pleasant aroma can promote a sense of relaxation.
plant.p1: Not only does the rosemary plant serve as decoration for a balcony or garden, but it is also an herb that enhances the flavor of dishes. Rosemary has various health benefits for humans as well, such as cooling effects, diuretic properties, anti-inflammatory properties, digestive support, and its pleasant aroma can promote a sense of relaxation.

plant.name: Codiaeum variegatum
plant.intro: The Codiaeum variegatum, or Coleus, possesses a variety of vibrant leaf colors and unique patterns. They are often cultivated for decorative purposes in flower pots, on balconies, or in front of homes. Sometimes, this type of plant is also grown indoors, but it requires a location with ample light, preferably near a window.
plant.p1: The Codiaeum variegatum, or Coleus, possesses a variety of vibrant leaf colors and unique patterns. They are often cultivated for decorative purposes in flower pots, on balconies, or in front of homes. Sometimes, this type of plant is also grown indoors, but it requires a location with ample light, preferably near a window.

plant.name: Cherry Brazil
plant.intro: The Brazilian cherry tree is a tropical cherry variety that is well-suited for the climate in Vietnam. It is popularly grown for decorative purposes in gardens, rooftops, and other outdoor areas. This plant produces small, sweet fruits that are rich in vitamins
plant.p1: The Brazilian cherry tree is a tropical cherry variety that is well-suited for the climate in Vietnam. It is popularly grown for decorative purposes in gardens, rooftops, and other outdoor areas. This plant produces small, sweet fruits that are rich in vitamins

plant.name: Petrea volubilis
plant.intro: Despite being called Mai Thái Xanh, it actually has romantic and captivating lavender-purple flowers. This plant variety, even though it has only been introduced to Vietnam in recent years, has quickly gained popularity among many people. It is favored not only for its robust growth, disease resistance, and long-lasting blossoms but also for its vibrant and attractive appearance.
plant.p1: Despite being called Mai Thái Xanh, it actually has romantic and captivating lavender-purple flowers. This plant variety, even though it has only been introduced to Vietnam in recent years, has quickly gained popularity among many people. It is favored not only for its robust growth, disease resistance, and long-lasting blossoms but also for its vibrant and attractive appearance.

plant.intro: Zamioculcas zamiifolia, commonly called ZZ plant or aroid palm, is an aroid family member that is native to dry grassland and forest in Eastern Africa.

plant.name: Philodendron Xanadu
plant.intro: It is a plant species with strong growth characteristics, often used by people to adorn living spaces and for interior decoration.

plant.name: Anthurium andreanum
plant.intro: The Anthurium andreanum plant is known as a type of ornamental plant that brings positive energy and can help harmonize Feng Shui in the home. It has the ability to attract positive energy flows and reduce negative energy in the surrounding environment..

plant.name: Peperomia obtusifolia var
plant.intro: The Peperomia obtusifolia var is a beautiful indoor ornamental plant with lush green leaves that are always vibrant and full of life. It is also a Feng Shui plant believed to bring health, luck, and wealth to the homeowner.
